verses.name: Psalms 54:1
verses.text: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.

verses.name: Psalms 54:2
verses.text: Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.

verses.name: Psalms 54:3
verses.text: For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 54:4
verses.text: Behold, God is mine helper: the Lord is with them that uphold my soul.

verses.name: Psalms 54:5
verses.text: He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.

verses.name: Psalms 54:6
verses.text: I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O Lord; for it is good.
